<h3 id="X1001" class="auto-style4">X(1001)&nbsp;=&nbsp;MIDPOINT OF X(1) AND X(9)</h3>
Trilinears &nbsp;&nbsp;  a<sup>2</sup> - a(b + c) - 2bc : :
<br>
<b>
X(1001) = X(1) + 3X(2) + (r/R)X(3)
</b>
<p>
Let O<sub>A</sub> be the circle tangent of side BC at its midpoint and to the circumcircle on the side of BC opposite A. Define O<sub>B</sub> and O<sub>C</sub> cyclically. X(1001) is the radical center of the circles O<sub>A</sub>, O<sub>B</sub>, O<sub>C</sub>.  (Randy Hutson, 9/23/2011)
</p>
<p>
Let L<sub>A</sub> and M<sub>A</sub> be the external tangents to circles O<sub>B</sub> and O<sub>C</sub>, with L<sub>A</sub> being the farther from O<sub>A</sub>. Define L<sub>B</sub>, L<sub>C</sub>, M<sub>B</sub>, and M<sub>C</sub> cyclically. Let A' = L<sub>B</sub>&cap;L<sub>C</sub> and A'' = M<sub>B</sub>&cap;M<sub>C</sub>, and define B', B'', C', and C'' cyclically. The lines A'A'', B'B'', C'C'' concur in X(1001).
</p>
<p>
Let A* be the tangency point of O<sub>A</sub> and the circumcircle, and define B* and C* cyclically. Let A** be the radical trace of O<sub>B</sub> and O<sub>C</sub>. The lines A*A**, B*B**, C*C** concur in X(1001).
</p>
<p>
For details and relationships among X(1001), X(1), X(145), X(3361), X(3616), X(3913), and X(4719), see</p>
<p><b>Luis Gonz&aacute;lez,</b> "On a Triad of Circles Tangent to the Circumcircle and the Sides at Their Midpoints," <a href="http://forumgeom.fau.edu/FG2011volume11/FG201115index.html"><b style="font-style: italic">Forum Geometricorum</b></a> 11 (2011) 145-154.
</p>
<p>
Let A' be the line through X(1) parallel to line BC.  Let A<sub>B</sub> = A'&cap;AB and A<sub>C</sub> = A'&cap;AC.  Define B<sub>C</sub> and C<sub>A</sub> cyclically, and define B<sub>A</sub> and C<sub>B</sub> cyclically.  The six points A<sub>B</sub>, B<sub>C</sub>, C<sub>A</sub>, A<sub>B</sub>, B<sub>C</sub>, C<sub>A</sub> lie on a conic whose center is X(1001).  (Angel Montesdeoca, April 27, 2016)
</p>
<p>
X(1001) lies on cubics K281, K1018, K1263, circumconics {A,B,C,X(1),X(673)}, {A,B,C,X(2),X(518)}, {A,B,C,X(6),X(105)}, {A,B,C,X(7),X(37)}, {A,B,C,X(9),X(86)}, {A,B,C,X(21),X(220)}, {A,B,C,X(56),X(213)}, {A,B,C,X(72),X(348)} and on these lines: {1, 6}, {2, 11}, {3, 142}, {4, 25466}, {5, 10198}, {7, 21}, {8, 344}, {10, 3295}, {12, 2478}, {20, 8273}, {22, 20988}, {25, 1848}, {31, 940}, {34, 15832}, {35, 474}, {36, 4312}, {38, 17597}, {40, 3812}, {42, 748}, {43, 3750}, {46, 5439}, {48, 5781}, {57, 3742}, {58, 10013}, {63, 354}, {65, 1445}, {69, 4966}, {75, 3685}, {77, 1456}, {78, 3059}, {81, 14969}, {85, 14189}, {87, 3445}, {99, 51314}, {104, 5851}, {106, 29351}, {140, 10200}, {141, 16850}, {144, 2975}, {145, 5260}, {165, 3848}, {171, 3052}, {182, 692}, {183, 30963}, {190, 24349}, {191, 18398}, {192, 17000}, {197, 5020}, {198, 4223}, 
{200, 3740}, {210, 3305}, {214, 15346}, {221, 37523}, {222, 17194}, {224, 2646}, {226, 1617}, {227, 19372}, {229, 37032}, {236, 8076}, {239, 20154}, {241, 2263}, {244, 4414}, {278, 4183}, {306, 3966}, {312, 3757}, {321, 4387}, {329, 3475}, {333, 10453}, {350, 16992}, {355, 16202}, {373, 51377}, {377, 6284}, {381, 3822}, {384, 20133}, {386, 16288}, {388, 452}, {404, 5217}, {406, 11398}, {442, 1479}, {443, 4294}, {468, 11383}, {495, 11236}, {496, 6675}, {498, 4187}, {499, 7483}, {515, 6913}, {517, 6883}, {519, 4078}, {527, 551}, {529, 1056}, {549, 35238}, {590, 44591}, {595, 5156}, {597, 48830}, {599, 33082}, {602, 5706}, {612, 3744}, {614, 968}, {615, 44590}, {620, 13173}, {631, 6691}, {659, 6009}, {667, 6008}, {674, 3781}, {726, 17262}, {740, 4068}, {750, 902}, {752, 17313}, {756, 3938}, {758, 15934}, {759, 8691}, {761, 13396}, {846, 982}, {874, 10009}, {894, 4676}, {896, 17450}, {898, 14665}, {899, 2177}, {900, 45695}, {908, 4679}, {932, 40720}, {934, 10004}, {936, 3174}, {938, 5775}, {942, 12514}, {943, 1058}, {944, 5817}, {950, 5794}, {962, 5584}, {971, 1385}, {975, 5266}, {978, 4255}, {985, 21793}, {986, 17054}, {988, 19528}, {995, 3736}, {997, 15733}, {1000, 5854}, {1004, 34879},

</p>
<p>X(1001) is the {X(1),X(238)}-harmonic conjugate of X(6). For a list of other harmonic conjugates of X(1001), click <b>Tables</b> at the top of this page.</p>
<p>
X(1001) = midpoint of X(i) in X(j) for these {i,j}: {1, 9}, {10, 30331}, {10443, 43170}, {15254, 42819}, {15481, 15570}, {15829, 30330}, {18481, 31672}, {2, 47357}, {24646, 24647}, {390, 2550}, {392, 10177}, {3243, 5223}, {3878, 30329}, {38053, 52653}, {4, 43161}, {40, 43166}, {42842, 42843}, {5220, 42871}, {5542, 51090}, {5732, 11372}, {5784, 14100}, {6172, 51099}, {6173, 50836}, {6767, 9708}, {7, 5698}, {72, 15185}, {8236, 38057}, {960, 5572}, {9623, 31393}<br>
